com.cognex.dataman.sdk

Class PreviewOption

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cognex.dataman.sdk.PreviewOption

  • public class PreviewOption
extends Object
    Controls the preview/scanning options when using the Mobile device camera. Preview defaults are set by the CameraMode but can be overridden. Multiple options can be OR'd together.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int ALWAYS_SHOW
      Force the preview to be displayed, even if off by default (e.g., when using CameraMode.PASSIVE_AIMER or CameraMode.ACTIVE_AIMER).
      static int DEFAULTS
      Use defaults (no overrides).
      static int HARDWARE_TRIGGER
      Enables the simulated hardware trigger (the volume down button).
      static int HIGH_FRAME_RATE
      Use higher framerate if the device supports it.
      static int HIGH_RESOLUTION
      Use higher resolution if the device supports it.
      static int NO_ILLUMINATION_BUTTON
      Disable illumination (removes illumination button from preview).
      static int NO_ZOOM_BUTTON
      Disable zoom feature (removes zoom button from preview).
      static int PAUSED
      When scanning starts, the preview is displayed but decoding is paused until a trigger (either the on screen button or the volume down button, if enabled) is pressed.
      static int SHOW_CLOSE_BUTTON
      Show close button in partial view.

      PreviewOption()

        Enables the simulated hardware trigger (the volume down button).

      • PAUSED

        public static final int PAUSED
        When scanning starts, the preview is displayed but decoding is paused until a trigger (either the on screen button or the volume down button, if enabled) is pressed.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ALWAYS_SHOW

        public static final int ALWAYS_SHOW
        Force the preview to be displayed, even if off by default (e.g., when using CameraMode.PASSIVE_AIMER or CameraMode.ACTIVE_AIMER).
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • HIGH_RESOLUTION

        public static final int HIGH_RESOLUTION
        Use higher resolution if the device supports it. Default is 1280x720, with this param 1920x1080 will be used.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • HIGH_FRAME_RATE

        public static final int HIGH_FRAME_RATE
        Use higher framerate if the device supports it. Default is 30 FPS, with this param 60 FPS will be used.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • SHOW_CLOSE_BUTTON

        public static final int SHOW_CLOSE_BUTTON
        Show close button in partial view.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values
